entries.title: Soccer fans throng Paris streets as France reaches World Cup final
entries.description: After coming through a tough match against Morocco, the French will now meet Argentina in Sunday’s final, with the chance to become the first side to retain the title since Brazil in 1962.

entries.title: France gets past underdog Morocco, advances to World Cup final vs. Argentina
entries.description: Theo Hernández and Randal Kolo Muani scored as France defeated underdog Morocco, 2-0, in Qatar on Wednesday, sending Les Blues into the World Cup final against

entries.title: Iran ousted from U.N. women's rights commission
entries.description: Iran was expelled from the U.N. Commission on the Status of Women over its “systematic oppression” of women and crackdown on protests over the death of Mahsa Amini.

entries.title: Peru’s new government declares national emergency, gives military new power
entries.description: Peru’s new government declared 30-day national emergency on Wednesday amid violent protests following the ouster of President Pedro Castillo.

entries.title: Judge denies Peru's ousted President Pedro Castillo’s jail appeal
entries.description: A judge ordered ousted Peruvian President Pedro Castillo to remain in custody on Tuesday, denying his appeal as authorities build a rebellion case against him.

entries.title: What the U.S. sending a Patriot missile defense system to Ukraine could mean for Putin's war
entries.description: The United States’ imminent approval of Patriot missile defense systems for Ukraine will be a blow to Putin's war and a timely boost for Kyiv.

entries.title: Turkish court orders jail time and political ban for Erdogan rival
entries.description: A Turkish court on Wednesday sentenced Istanbul Mayor Ekrem Imamoglu, a popular rival of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan, to more than two years in prison and

entries.title: 'Harry & Meghan' wrestles with lingering impact of racism and colonialism
entries.description: a member of the 1,000-year-old British royal family

entries.title: New Hampshire man accused of sending weapons to Russia
entries.description: Investigators say millions in military equipment was sent to Russia by a ring operated out of a New Hampshire home.  WBTS' Eli Rosenberg reports.

entries.title: 4 dead after small boat capsizes in English Channel
entries.description: Helicopters and lifeboats gathered in the English Channel off the coast of southern England to rescue a small boat that had capsized in the freezing water, killing four people, the British government said Wednesday.

entries.title: Ukraine official says American citizen Suedi Murekezi released in Ukraine-Russia prisoner swap
entries.description: American citizen Suedi Murekezi was reportedly freed after Ukraine and Russia conducted another prisoner exchange, said Andriy Yermak, the head of the President

entries.title: U.S. soccer journalist Grant Wahl died of an aortic aneurysm while covering World Cup in Qatar, his wife says
entries.description: Soccer journalist Grant Wahl died of an aortic aneurysm in Qatar, where he was covering the World Cup, his wife said Wednesday, citing an autopsy.

entries.title: Soccer legend Maradona is cheering Lionel Messi from heaven, Argentina fans sing ahead of World Cup final
entries.description: The parallels between the two all-time greats of Argentine soccer, Diego Maradona and Lionel Messi, are becoming ever more striking in Qatar for Argentina fans.

entries.title: 4 confirmed dead after boat capsizes in English Channel
entries.description: Helicopters and lifeboats swooped to the English Channel to rescue a small boat that capsized in the freezing water,  killing four people, authorities said Wednesday.

entries.title: Russian drone hits Kyiv building but many more shot down, officials say
entries.description: A predawn Russian drone attack triggered air raid sirens in Kyiv on Wednesday. At least one drone smashed a hole in the roof of a building, but city officials said air defenses prevented serious damage.

entries.title: Australian police investigate extremist views of cop killers
entries.description: Australian police are investigating the extremist views of three people who shot and killed two officers and a neighbor, before they themselves were killed hours later by police in a gunfight in rural Queensland. In all, six people died in the violence on Monday.

entries.title: Morocco faces France in politically charged World Cup semifinal
entries.description: Hind Sabouni bristles with pride as she recalls her country’s history-making World Cup run as it eliminated one European soccer powerhouse and former colonial

entries.title: Australian police investigate extremist views of cop killers
entries.description: Australian police are investigating the extremist views of three people who shot and killed two officers and a neighbor at a rural property in Queensland.

entries.title: Argentina erupts in joy after team reaches World Cup final
entries.description: The streets of Argentina turned into a party  as the national team beat Croatia to earn this soccer-crazed South American nation a place in the World Cup final.

entries.title: Political turmoil spreads across Latin America
entries.description: Political turmoil continues in Latin America with a series of actions against former presidents in several different countries over the past few weeks. The ex-president of Panama is now joining the list as he faces a trial for money laundering and in Peru, the recently deposed president says he will not quit his position. NBC News’ Guad Venegas has the latest.

entries.title: U.S. is set to approve sending Patriot missile battery to Ukraine
entries.description: The U.S. is poised to approve sending a Patriot missile battery to Ukraine, finally agreeing to an urgent request from Ukrainian leaders desperate for more
